features: Compatible with Stanley Tumblers: These straws are designed to fit perfectly into Stanley tumblers, so you can enjoy your favorite drinks without worrying about spills or leaks.Not only Compatible with Stanley 14/20 /30/40 oz Stanley Cup,but also for other cups ,you can cut any length according to your cup height.
Durable and Reusable: These replacement straws for Stanley water bottles made from high-quality silicone, these straws are built to last and can be reused again and again.
Easy to Clean: Cleaning these straws is a breeze! They are dishwasher safe or can be easily cleaned with the included cleaning brush.
Silicone Straws: Say goodbye to disposable plastic straws and switch to these silicone straws.
BPA-Free and Safe: These straws are made from food-grade silicone,making them safe for everyone to use.

This silicone reusable straws is Compatible with Stanley Cup Looking for a way to enjoy your favorite drinks at the same time? Our Silicone Straws are the perfect solution! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement straws
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect to replace the plastic or metal straws that come with a lot of tumblers. I like to have the silicone ones because I have young kids and don’t want them to drink out of my cup and fall with something hard in their mouths. They fit the 40 oz tumblers well. This one is a 40 oz meoky. It does lean a little to the side because the cup has an anti leak flap but it doesn’t affect anything. The clear makes it easy to watch out for mold also

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement straws
reviews.reviewText: Figs my 40 ounce Stanley perfect!I thought these were the soft flexible straws but they weren’t. Still work great though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not hard enough
reviews.reviewText: The straw is a great size for Stanley 40 ounce cup. The straw isn’t very durable it bends very easy. If you would like a more flexible straw this would work for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t fit Stanley
reviews.reviewText: This straw is not wide enough for the Stanley. Water leaks around it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These have been great for kids. Love the fact you can customize to fit your cup size!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Having a straw that is reusable in my travel mug is absolute genius. The fact they are clear is even better so cleanliness is visually verified at the sink before that first sip. I love these things and use them for cold AND hot drinks!
